member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of a raytracing hit group state subobject. Use a value from this enumeration with the structure.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_TYPE.D3D12_HIT_GROUP_TYPE_TRIANGLES
member.summary: The hit group uses a list of triangles to calculate ray hits. Hit groups that use triangles can’t contain an intersection shader.

member.name: D3D12_HIT_GROUP_TYPE.D3D12_HIT_GROUP_TYPE_PROCEDURAL_PRIMITIVE
member.summary: The hit group uses a procedural primitive within a bounding box to calculate ray hits. Hit groups that use procedural primitives must contain an intersection shader.
